fields.name: Beer Battered Seitan on Belgian Waffles
Abyssinia Ethiopian Restaurant
fields.notes: Offers a vegan combination plate (lentils, salad, collard greens, and other vegetables on top of injera) at a reasonable price.

fields.name: Adobe Cafe
fields.notes: Similar to their Roxborough location, almost all of their regular menu is duplicated in a vegetarian version with vegan cheese and sour cream available.

fields.name: Adobe Cafe Roxborough
fields.notes: Similar to their South Philly location, almost all of their regular menu is duplicated in a vegetarian version with vegan cheese and sour cream available. This location hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: A Full Plate, Cafe & Catering
fields.notes: Offers a number of vegan dinner entrees and sides, including a mac and cheese made with three housemade nut cheeses. Vegan brunch options are tofu scramble and french toast. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Aroma
fields.notes:
Healthy, fresh and authentic Mediterrean food at this affordable family-run restaurant near Valley Forge Park and King of Prussia.
Flavorful veg items (incl homemade soups made with all-vegetable stock) are clearly marked on the menu.
fields.address:
10104 Valley Forge Circle
King Of Prussia, PA  19406

fields.name: Atiya Ola's Spirit First Foods
fields.notes: Unique cafe with vegan options and raw food options. Closed Tuesdays and Wednesdays. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: B2
fields.notes: Offers bagels with Tofutti cream cheese and a hummus sandwich option, in addition to vegan desserts. B2 hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Benna's Cafe
fields.notes: Offers vegan options including vegan cream cheese and desserts. Benna's hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Blackbird Pizzeria
fields.notes: Philly's only all vegan pizzeria. You can opt for a 12" or an 18" pie, and rotating pies are sold by the slice. You can also get your hands on a seitan cheesesteak or a number of other hot sandwiches and wraps, in addition to wings, salads, soups, and Vegan Treats desserts.

fields.name: Black N Brew
fields.notes: Vegan brunch options include tofu scramble and breakfast burritos with no cheese or sour cream, and lunch options include hummus sandwiches and veggie burgers. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Cafe at the Mills
fields.notes: Their menu lists vegan soups and a number of vegan entrees with and without vegan cheese. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Cafe Lift
fields.notes: Not particularly vegan friendly, but their veggie panini is an assortment of grilled veggies and bean spread on soft bread, and it also comes with a side salad. Closed Mondays. Cafe Lift hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Cake and the Beanstalk
fields.notes: Offers vegan chocolate chip cookies, hummus/veggie panini or bagel, and sometimes a vegan soup. Cake and the Beanstalk hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Cantina Dos Segundos
fields.notes:
Vegan and vegetarian menu items are clearly indicated, and there is always a rotating vegan special. 
For those seeking a gluten-free meal, the fajitas can be ordered without seitan and substituting wheat tortillas for corn. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!
fields.address: 931 North 2nd Street, Philadelphia, PA, United States

fields.name: Cantina Los Caballitos
fields.notes:
Vegan and vegetarian menu items are clearly indicated, and there is always a rotating vegan special. 
For those seeking a gluten-free meal, the fajitas can be ordered without seitan and substituting wheat tortillas for corn. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!
fields.address: 1651 East Passyunk Avenue, Philadelphia, PA, United States

fields.name: Charles Plaza
fields.notes: Offers a separate vegetarian menu with many vegan mock meat and tofu options. Monday-Friday lunch special includes soup and entree for $7. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Chestnut Food Market
fields.notes: Typical center city deli with more groceries than most, a little produce, lots of snack items. Deli makes a veggie cheesesteak that is vegan without cheese. Ask them to go easy on the hot peppers if you don't like it fiery. This vendor hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Chipotle Mexican Grill: Center City East
fields.notes: Burritos/tacos/salads made on the spot as you select your ingredients. Vegan options are rice, black beans, guacamole, salsa, stir fried peppers and onions, and lettuce. This Chipotle location hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Chipotle Mexican Grill: Center City West
fields.notes: Burritos/tacos/salads made on the spot as you select your ingredients. Vegan options are rice, black beans, guacamole, salsa, stir fried peppers and onions, and lettuce. This Chipotle location hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Chipotle Mexican Grill: West Philly
fields.notes: Burritos/tacos/salads made on the spot as you select your ingredients. Vegan options are rice, black beans, guacamole, salsa, stir fried peppers and onions, and lettuce. This Chipotle location hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Citi Marketplace
fields.notes: Nicer center city grocer/deli with a full vegetarian sandwich menu(tofu club, veggie cheesesteaks, veg chicken salad, meatball subs, etc). The grocery itself has a lot of vegan specialty items(like vegan jerky and frozen/refrigerator items).

fields.name: Couch Tomato Cafe
fields.notes: Offers a vegan pizza with Daiya cheese and a large selection of veggie toppings.

fields.name: Devi
fields.notes: A VegPhilly user hasn't visited here yet. Let us know what you think.

fields.name: Dock Street Pub
fields.notes: Offers a number of veggie options, including vegan pizza, housemade vegan burgers, and a vegan pesto wrap.

fields.name: Doobie's
fields.notes: Neighborhood bar that offers veggie burgers and pita pizzas with vegan cheese. Doobie's hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Earth Bread and Brewery
fields.notes: Flatbreads (pizza) with interesting toppings. Soups and salads. Waitstaff are understanding of dietary concerns. Housemade (vegan) beer as well as guest beers.

fields.name: Eat-A-Pita
fields.notes: Obviously a pita restaurant. They have a Panini called "The Vegan", a tofu BLT as well as veggie chili.

fields.name: Ed's Buffalo Wings & Pizza
fields.notes: Offers a vegan pizza with Daiya cheese in addition to a few other clearly labeled vegan and vegetarian  options on the menu. Ed's hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Essene Market & Cafe
fields.notes: An independently owned natural foods store featuring an all vegetarian, mostly vegan, hot bar/salad bar buffet with an emphasis on seasonal produce. Hot bar/salad bar is $8.99/lb, and there is a self-bussed cafe seating area. Essene hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Ethio Cafe
fields.notes: Their menu lists a few vegetarian items including collard green stew, lentil stew, steamed cabbage, and a veggie combo. Closed Mondays. Ethio Cafe hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Falafel Bar
fields.notes: Enjoy a falafel sandwich or platter with freshly made falafel balls. Online ordering is available. Closed Saturdays.
fields.address: 1513 Chestnut Street, Philadelphia, PA, United States

fields.name: Fare Restaurant
fields.notes: Offers a few organic vegan options, including vegetable cakes and stir fried seitan, on their otherwise meat-loaded menu. Also offers tofu scramble with vegan bacon as a brunch option.
fields.address: 2028 Fairmount Avenue, Philadelphia, PA, United States

fields.name: Farmicia
fields.notes: Offers a few vegan and vegetarian options, including vegan tamales as a dinner entree and tofu scramble with vegan chorizo as a brunch plate.  Farmicia hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Fino's Pizzeria & Restaurant
fields.notes: Their menu lists vegan pizza and a number of mock meat sandwiches, wraps, burgers, and pasta options. Closed Sundays. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Franklin Fountain
fields.notes: Features a few rotating vegan flavors of housemade ice cream and sorbet. The atmosphere is reminiscent of a 1950's soda bar-- employees wear bowties and suspenders, and they actually still use an old hand cranked telephone. Franklin Fountain hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Gia Pronto
fields.notes:
At GIA PRONTO our foods are 100% natural
and made with the highest quality ingredients.

Our meats will always be free-range and hormone free.

Chemical additives and artificial preservatives will never be used.

This is our promise!

fields.name: Golden Empress Garden
fields.notes: Their menu lists lots of imitation-meat Chinese dishes and other vegetarian options. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Good Dog Bar & Restaurant
fields.notes: Their menu lists a vegan burger and a vegan sloppy joe. The bar has photos of dogs all over the walls, a pool table, darts, and a vintage arcade machine. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Good Karma Cafe: Society Hill
fields.notes: Offers a number of vegan sandwiches, snacks, baked goods, and fruit. Also has lots of seating and a back room that can be reserved for meetings.

fields.name: Govinda's Gourmet To Go Vegetarian
fields.notes: Often a go-to-spot for vegan cheesesteaks, Govinda's offers a selection of mock meat sandwiches and wraps, in addition to housemade soups and salads. Govinda's To Go is the takeout/cafe style seating location, and Govinda's vegetarian is the dine-in restaurant next door, which is open Thursday-Sunday for dinner. Govinda's hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Green Eggs Cafe: Center City
fields.notes: This is a hot spot for brunch on the weekends. They offer vegan French toast with raspberry coulis and vegan whipped cream as well as vegan sausage. Make sure you tell the server you are vegan and they will help you navigate the offerings. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Green Eggs Cafe: South Philly
fields.notes: This is a hot spot for brunch on the weekends. Vegan items on the menu are clearly indicated. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Grindcore House
fields.notes: Philadelphia's all-vegan coffee shop. Enjoy vegan sandwiches, sweet treats, coffee, and a distinctly punk/metal vibe.

fields.name: Hamifgash Restaurant
fields.notes: Offers falafel, hummus, and baba ghanoush sandwiches. Closed Saturdays. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Hibiscus
fields.notes: Primarily a juice bar with a medium-sized, mostly vegan menu with wraps and sandwiches. They make a vegan pizza. All of their baked goods are vegan. Hibiscus hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: HipCityVeg
fields.notes: In addition to being all vegan, HipCityVeg is also eco-friendly with bike delivery, compostable food packaging, and local food sourcing. Their menu offers a diverse range of burgers, sandwiches, salads, desserts, and seasonal specials.

fields.name: Honey's Sit 'n Eat
fields.notes: Honey's is one of Philadelphia's weekend brunch hotspots, so the wait for a table is often long. Their vegan brunch option is a generously sized plate of savory tofu scramble.  Watch out for an additional location in Graduate Hospital opening soon. Honey's hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Hot Diggity
fields.notes:
Hot Diggity features regionally inspired hot dogs like 'The Bronx Bomber' and 'The Cincinnati Skyline,' along with handcut fries and a variety of vegan and non-vegan dipping sauces. All dogs can be made vegan or vegetarian. Hot Diggity also features its own homemade root beer. 

NOTE: The veggie dogs are vegan, but the buns are not vegan unless you request a vegan bun.  Be sure to request a "vegan veggie dog" and not just a "veggie dog".

fields.name: Hummus Grill
fields.notes: Offers Mediterranean food with vegan items clearly marked on the menu. Falafel sandwiches come with lots of vegetable options. Online ordering available. Hummus hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Khyber Pass Pub
fields.notes: The Khyber is a Louisiana soul food joint that's a sister restaurant of the Royal Tavern and Cantina Dos Segundos + Los Caballitos. There are several vegan and vegetarian lunch/brunch/dinner entrees, and they are all clearly marked on the menu, There is also usually at least one vegan special.

fields.name: Kind Cafe
fields.notes: This restaurant is closed.

fields.name: Kingdom of Vegetarians Restaurant
fields.notes: Offers a range of mock meats, tofu, and vegetable entrees. The Monday-Sunday lunch menu includes an entree with soup for $7. Note: no delivery. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Kung Fu Hoagies
fields.notes: One of Philly's only fully vegetarian food carts, KFH offers traditional tofu bahn mi sandwiches and veggie pho + ramen soups as regulars on the menu, but you can often get your hands on a sticky rice special. And just about everything is under $5. Follow @kungfuhoagies for updates on the cart location.

fields.name: Little Baby's Ice Cream
fields.notes: Little Baby's features creative flavors of small batch dairy and non-dairy ice cream. Vegan flavors are coconut- or almond-based. Their storefront in Fishtown is open all year round, and their tricycle carts can usually be spotted at events around the city. Follow @LittleBabysIC for updates on cart locations and new flavors.

fields.name: Local 44
fields.notes: Vegan and vegetarian options are clearly noted on the menu. Vegan lunch/dinner entrees include a seitan reuben, black bean burger, tempeh tacos, and General Tso's tofu. Brunch option is a shiitake tofu sandwich. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Mad Mex
fields.notes: Offers several vegan options and will make most dishes vegan with marinated tofu, beans, or mushrooms. They also offer Daiya cheese and Tofutti sour cream.

fields.name: Magic Carpet Foods
fields.notes: Lunchtime food card that is located at 34th and Walnut Streets on Monday-Friday. Offers a set menu of dishes with seitan, tofu, tempeh, and veggies in addition of a variety of rotating special meals and wraps. Magic Carpet hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Mama's Vegetarian
fields.notes: Offers hummus and pita sandwiches and veggie platters. Small seating area. Closed Saturdays.

fields.name: Maoz Vegetarian: South Street
fields.notes: All vegetarian falafel takeout with a fully loaded self-serve topping/salad bar. Seating is limited. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Maoz Vegetarian: Walnut Street
fields.notes: All vegetarian falafel takeout with a fully loaded self-serve topping/salad bar. Seating is limited. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Memphis Taproom
fields.notes: Vegan and vegetarian items are clearly marked on the menu, and there are sometimes vegan specials. Vegan options include hot sandwiches and a pumpkin pot pie on the lunch/dinner menu, and belgian waffles and tofu scramble on the brunch menu.

fields.name: Mi Lah Vegetarian
fields.notes: Offers diverse lunch, dinner, and brunch menus with creative combinations of vegetables, tofu, and seitan. There is plenty of seating so there's usually no wait for weekend brunch.

fields.name: Miss Rachel's Pantry
fields.notes: A vegan catering/meal delivery service and private event space that hosts Saturday night dinners open to the public. Saturday dinners include a four-course vegan meal for $45, which you should make a reservation for 1-2 weeks ahead of time. On Wednesdays, you can also get an $11 lunch delivered anywhere in Center City. Miss Rachel's has not been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!
fields.address: 1732 West Passyunk Avenue, Philadelphia, PA, United States

fields.name: Mood Cafe
fields.notes: Takeout place that serves chaats (savory snacks of crispy bread and vegetables), which can be made vegan upon request. Also serves Vegan Lassis with almond or coconut milk in a variety of flavors. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Mugshots Coffeehouse & Cafe: Brewerytown
fields.notes: Hit up Mugshots for a vegan hummus and veggie wrap, a tofu bahn mi, a mock meat bagel sandwich, or vegan chili. Also check out its events calendar for Open Mic Nights and other community events. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Mugshots Coffeehouse & Cafe: Fairmount
fields.notes: Hit up Mugshots for a vegan hummus and veggie wrap, a tofu bahn mi, a mock meat bagel sandwich, or vegan chili. Also check out its events calendar for Open Mic Nights and other community events. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Mumbai Bistro
fields.notes: Offers an ala carte menu and buffet with entrees that do not have butter or ghee. Unlike many Indian restaurants, vegan items are clearly marked on the menu and buffet. Buffet is $4.95/lb. Closed Mondays.

fields.name: Nam Son
fields.notes: Offers a tofu bahn mi sandwich for under $5. Lots of seating makes this a good spot for large groups. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: New Harmony Vegetarian Restaurant
fields.notes: Offers a range of mock chicken, beef, duck, and seafood entrees and dim sum options. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: North Bowl
fields.notes: Northbowl is a 1950s themed bowling alley that serves a full menu of food right at your lane. They have some vegan options including a vegan BLT, soba noodles, and tater tots. Cash only for bowling. 21+ after 9pm. Northbowl hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: PF. Chang's China Bistro
fields.notes: TEST
fields.address:
Plymouth Meeting Mall
510 Germantown Pike
Plymouth Meeting, PA 19462

fields.name: Philadelphia Chutney Company
fields.notes: Specializes in dosas, which can be made vegan. This restaurant has not been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Pub On Passyunk East
fields.notes: Vegan and vegetarian options are clearly marked on the menu. Offers a tofu scramble as a vegan brunch entree and a vegan cheesesteak as a vegan dinner entree, in addition to a few vegan starters and sides.

fields.name: Pure Sweets
fields.notes: Vegan, kosher, and gluten-free wholesale bakery that distributes at grocery stores and coffeeshops throughout the city. The address listed here is not a storefront; it's where Pure Sweets' commercial kitchen is located. Pure Sweets hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Qdoba Mexican Grill: West Philly
fields.notes: Offers fast Mexican food with vegan rice, bean, and veggie options, but no vegan cheese or sour cream options. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Random Tea Room
fields.notes: Tea Room and Curiosity Shop with some vegan snacks and an extensive selection of teas. Closed Mondays. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Rice & Mix
fields.notes: Menu lists vegetarian soon du bu, jap chae, bibimbop, and the option to build your own bowl. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Royal Tavern
fields.notes: Vegan and vegetarian options are clearly noted on the menu, and there is usually at least one vegan special. Vegan entrees include a tofu and tempeh hash for brunch, and a tempeh club, vegan sloppy joe, and grilled sweet potato bahn mi for lunch and dinner.

fields.name: Saad's Halal Restaurant
fields.notes: Offers a selection of falafel, hummus, tabouli, and baba ghanouj. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Sabrina's Cafe
fields.notes: Sabrina's Cafe is located in the heart of the Italian Market in South Philadelphia. Opened in 2001 in an old bakery, this family friendly BYOB serves Breakfast, Brunch, and Dinner.

fields.name: Sabrina's Cafe: Fairmount
fields.notes: Offers all day breakfast including vegan tofu scramble, in addition to several vegan lunch/dinner entrees. There is also always a vegan brunch special. Sabrina's is one of Philly's most popular weekend brunch joints, and the wait can be upwards of an hour especially if you have a larger group. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Sabrina's Cafe: Italian Market
fields.notes: Offers all day breakfast including vegan tofu scramble, in addition to several vegan lunch/dinner entrees. There is also always a vegan brunch special. Sabrina's is one of Philly's most popular weekend brunch joints, and the wait can be upwards of an hour especially if you have a larger group. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Sabrinas Cafe @ Powelton
fields.notes: Sabrina's Cafe @ Powelton, is located in University City on Drexel's Campus and is open to the public. This family friendly Breakfast, Brunch, and Dinner spot has been serving up ever changing, creative, and delicious brunch / dinner specials since 2011.

fields.name: Sam's Morning Glory Diner
fields.notes: Vegan options include a tofu scramble, a veggie burger in a pita with hummus, and a cheesesteak without cheese (vegan cheese isn't available). Vegetarians also have the option of a grilled cheese sandwich or mac and cheese. This restaurant has not been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: San Samosa
fields.notes: Vegan items are not clearly marked on the menu, but vegetarian items are. Offers mock meat substitutes for curries, tikka masala, and vindaloo, in addition to vegetable biryani and korma dishes. This restaurant has not been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Santa Fe Burrito: Wynnewood
fields.notes: Offers burritos and tacos with a mock meat option, but their menu doesn't list vegan cheese or sour cream options. This restaurant has not been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Satellite Cafe
fields.notes: Offers bagels with vegan cream cheese in addition to sandwiches, wraps, and quesadillas with Daiya cheese, tofu, black bean, and veggie options. Everything listed on the menu is under $5. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Singapore Kosher Vegetarian Restaurant
fields.notes: Offers a large vegan dim sum menu, in addition to mock meat dishes, tofu/vegetable plates, and chef's specials. This restaurant has not been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Sketch
fields.notes: Offers a vegan bean burger with several vegan sauce options, but no vegan cheese options. Also offers vegan desserts and milkshakes made with non-dairy ice cream. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Slice - Center City
fields.notes: They have vegan cheese

fields.name: Slice - South Philly
fields.notes: They have vegan cheese

fields.name: South Philadelphia Tap Room
fields.notes: Vegan and vegetarian items are clearly marked on the menu, but the spicy vegan hoagie is the only vegan lunch/dinner/brunch option. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Soy Cafe
fields.notes: Offers hot/cold sandwiches, wraps, and salads that can be made vegan. Also offers an extensive selection of freshly made smoothies and seasonal juices. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Su Xing House
fields.notes: Offers a vast selection of tofu/vegetable plates and chef's specialties. Some plates have eggs, but can be made without. Monday-Saturday lunch specials includes a main, soup, and side for around $7. Closed Sundays.

fields.name: Sweet Freedom Bakery
fields.notes: One of Philly's fully vegan and gluten-free bakeries. Offers cupcakes, cookies, muffins, donuts, breads, and other sweet treats. Special orders accepted. Closed Mondays.

fields.name: Tamarind Thai
fields.notes:
Like most Thai places, the vegetarian menu is a misnomer. Most items on the vegetarian menu actually have seafood ingredients such as fish sauce.

However, unlike most Thai places, Tamarind is able to make most menu items without animal ingredients upon request.
fields.address: 117 South Street, Philadelphia, PA, United States

fields.name: Tampopo: University City
fields.notes: Closed Monday. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Tattooed Mom
fields.notes: Offers vegan burgers and hot sandwiches with Daiya cheese as an option. Often has weekday evening specials that include $3 vegan burgers and $1 vegan tacos. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Thai Singha House: West Philly
fields.notes: Most entrees, including those listed as vegetarian, have fish sauce that is not optional. Options with no fish sauce include stir fried vegetables and steamed vegetables. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: The Abbaye
fields.notes: Offers vegan wings, BBQ seitan, vegetarian cheesesteak (which can be made vegan by ordering no cheese or aoli), and typically a veggie special or two. No vegan brunch options. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: The Belgian Cafe
fields.notes: Offers stuffed tofu, vegan barbeque wings, seitan tacos, and a seitan vegan brunch option. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: The Last Drop Coffee House
fields.notes: Offers coffee, premade hummus + veggie sandwiches, and Vegan Treats desserts.  This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: The Nile Cafe
fields.notes: Offers sandwiches, wraps, platters, and mock meat chef specials, in addition to desserts, smoothies, and shakes. Closed Mondays. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Tiffin
fields.notes: Eat in and delivery! Good variety of vegetarian options and delicious.

fields.name: Underdogs
fields.notes: They have vegan hot dogs(well, Tofurkey sausages)

fields.name: Vedge
fields.notes: Philly's premiere fine dining vegan restaurant, Vedge offers a tapas-style menu with an emphasis on locally sourced vegetables. Their Monday-Friday happy hour from 5-7pm features discounted food and drink specials. We recommend making a reservation, especially for groups larger than two.

fields.name: Vegan Tree
fields.notes: Offers vegan cheesesteaks and pasta in addition to a range of pan-asian dishes such as sushi and fried noodles. Their menu also includes a wide selection of desserts and bubble teas. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Veggie Lovers
fields.notes: Offers affordable Monday-Saturday lunch specials and an extensive dinner menu with traditional veggie and mock meat dishes. Lunch special includes a main, soup, and appetizer for around $6. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Vge Cafe
fields.notes: Offers vegan cheesesteaks, reubens, falafel, and more. The menu also indicates that no canned vegetables are used and no food is fried. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!
fields.address: 845 W Lancaster Ave  Bryn Mawr, PA 19010

fields.name: Vientiane Cafe
fields.notes: Offers vegan pad thai, fried rice, and several other dishes. This restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet-- let us know what you think!

fields.name: Vietnam Cafe
fields.notes: There are basically two vegan options here: The vermicelli rice bowl (make sure to order it without fish sauce) with tofu, and the salt and pepper tofu.

fields.name: Watkins Drinkery
fields.notes: They change the menu every season, but so far they include 2 or 3 creative vegan options every time.

fields.name: White Dog Cafe
fields.notes: While vegan and vegetarian items are clearly noted on the menu, there is only one vegan lunch/dinner main (stewed tofu and vegetables) and there are no vegan brunch options.

fields.name: Whole Foods Market: Fairmount
fields.notes: Deli counter includes a build-your-own $6 sandwich station, and the small hot bar usually has at least one vegan option. Salad bar includes a wide selection of raw food, grains, nuts, fruit, and marinated veg. $8.49/lb.

fields.name: Whole Foods Market: South Street
fields.notes: Deli counter includes a build-your-own $6 burrito/quesadilla/tacos station, and the large hot bar almost always has a number of vegan mains, sides, and soups. Salad bar includes a wide selection of raw food, grains, nuts, fruit, and marinated veg. $8.49/lb.
